name: places/ChIJe54bk5VZwokROB5yHffdOZM
formattedAddress: 147 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 147 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text:
A horrible, rude younger woman stopped me and told me to get in line to be seen by the teller. I was already in queue heading there when a man from behind me cut in front of me and went to the teller. There weren't any other customers around and I didn't say anything about someone cutting in front of me. Then this younger woman comes to me and starts acting rude and tells me I need to get in line. She continued talking in jibberish and said she was the bank manager hence I needed to listen to her. This is a horrible service - what is it to me whether someone is a manager or not, I have been a customer of your bank for several years and am happy to pull out and close all my accounts and move to a different bank without hesitation. This younger woman did not dare to step in and correct the male customer but was very rude to me.
Teach your employees customer service 101.

originalText.text: Someone picked up the phone immediately and was polite and helpful. When we went in person, our banker Ms. Denise Doggett was professional, courteous and kind. While we were not able to open a new account as we initially wanted to do, she explained in detail what documents we needed and gave us alternative ideas about setting up an account.

originalText.text: To make a story real long short and quick I just received $20,000 from an Associate and Partner Group, in order to enhance my musical career, the money was available in my Account (901238839) Here in New York city, now they've takin the money out and some lady csrep (Middle Eastern accent) posing as the Federal Government says that she's closing my account.I go by MAGIK DOLLA

originalText.text: Kind service, fast speed, everything you would expect from a bank :)

text.text: Kind service, fast speed, everything you would expect from a bank :)

originalText.text: After 30 years of having accounts with Chase, it is consistently disappointing to find such a lack of customer service in this branch. It’s hit or miss with the bankers but overall, they could use lessons in servicing their customers. Manager Reann Nash needs to be made aware of customer’s experiences.
